definition: to receive/to answer (the phone)/to meet or welcome sb/to connect/to catch/to join/to extend/to take one's turn on duty/to take over for sb

sentences.english: Accelerators are generally used in near-surface applications in which the temperature is relatively low.
sentences.chinese: 速凝劑一般在溫度相對較低的接近地面的情況下使用。

sentences.english: Make four indentations into the condenser near the standard cone joint .
sentences.chinese: 在冷凝器接近標準圓錐接頭處打四個穴孔。

sentences.english: Modify your diet to exclude or limit dairy products, alcohol, smoking or other stimulants.
sentences.chinese: 不喫或少喫乳製品，儘量不要接近菸酒或其他刺激物。

sentences.english: The peach pies and chocolate Mousse cakes are nearly finished.
sentences.chinese: 桃餡餅和巧克力慕斯蛋糕也接近賣完。

sentences.english: I'm still a bit of a behind-the-striker player when possible.
sentences.chinese: 如果有機會，我仍然會更接近前鋒身後的位置。

sentences.english: It' near Guzhen Park and about 300 meters away from my shop.
sentences.chinese: 門市接近古鎮公園，離我門市大年夜約300米距離。

sentences.english: We'll keep you posted on developments with this one as it nears its release date.
sentences.chinese: 我們將保留您的留言於開發上和接近釋出遊戲時。

sentences.english: The viscous flow activation energy was higher than that of the viscose solution.
sentences.chinese: 溶液的粘流活化能高於粘膠，與棉漿溶液接近。

sentences.english: It is the nearest whole number to an atom's ATOMIC WEIGHT.
sentences.chinese: 它是最接近原子的原子量的整數。

sentences.english: They are famous for the lifelike reality of their paintings.
sentences.chinese: 他們因對事物的描繪幾乎接近真實而出名。

sentences.english: The closer a society's population growth rate gets to zero, the more population aging it will be.
sentences.chinese: 一個社會的人口增加率越接近零，其人口便愈老齡化。

sentences.english: No approach to the equipment by any child and non-operator.
sentences.chinese: 防止兒童和非機器操作人員接觸或接近本設備。

sentences.english: Rajin-Sonbong (or Rason, for short) lies by the Sea of Japan in the country’s north-east, near the border with Russia.
sentences.chinese: 羅津靠近日本海，在北韓的東北部，接近俄國邊界。

sentences.english: Sets the pix el at the specified point to the closest approximation of the specified color.
sentences.chinese: 設置指定點像素爲最接近指定色的近似值。

sentences.english: Her drive and determination won her a place close to Murdoch.
sentences.chinese: 她的幹勁和決心爲她贏得了接近默多克的位置。

sentences.english: Modellers may already be onto the answer.
sentences.chinese: 構建模型的學者們可能已經接近答案。

definition: to press on towards/to close in on/to approach/to draw near
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
almost/nearly/more or less/about the same/good enough/not bad
to make clear/to make known/to state clearly/to indicate/known
